generate_umg_block.description: Creates and saves a UMG block as JSON

log_block.description: Saves a block structure to memory/logs

list_blocks.description: Lists all blocks in a directory (default: memory/overlays/)

validate_block.description: Validates a block at a given path (UMG + CPF schema)

read_file.description: Reads and returns contents of a file

write_file.description: Writes content to a file at a specified path

load_sleeve.description: Loads a single sleeve and writes to active_state.json

run_manifest_task.description: Execute system command based on manifest_tasks.json entry
